name: DOS Dialog
author: Dan Ruscoe

sections.description:
If you’re a WordPress site owner longing for the days of Microsoft DOS,
this plugin will fill your heart’s entire 32MB of free space with joy.

The enclosed MS DOS Dialog Gutenberg block allows you to add old-school
MS DOS dialog boxes with custom title and message fields!

Font

The font used by this plugin is Modern DOS. It’s public domain and can be found here:
https://www.dafont.com/modern-dos.font

Future Improvements

  • Blinking text (not certain that’s an improvement)
sections.installation:
1. Copy the plugin to /wp-content/plugins/dos-dialog
  2. Activate the DOS Dialog plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Add block styles to customize dialog color

1.0.0

  • Release

short_description: A Gutenberg block that displays your text in the form of an old MS DOS dialog box.

screenshots.caption: The MS Dos Dialog block showing off some fun Pentium II CPU facts!
